doc.field: Records of the Society of Daughters of Holland Dames, Descendants of the Ancient and Honorable Families of New Netherland
Records of the Society of Daughters of Holland Dames, Descendants of the Ancient and Honorable Families of New Netherland

Topics include: DHD news, promotion membership; Board meetings (March 3 and 27, 2017); Grant recipient, Artyom Anikin; Introduction to Historical Records Book, 1895-2017, by Elbrun Kimmelman; Anniversary Book; Annual meeting (May 5, 2017); Board meeting (October 26, 2017); Directress General lunch photos; budget; Trip to Susan Durkee's (May 2017); Paas Heritage Ball; Anniversary Book: Historic Record, 1895-2017; Grant Document for Short-Term Fellowship.
Records of the Society of Daughters of Holland Dames, Descendants of the Ancient and Honorable Families of New Netherland
Series I. Governance >> Subseries I.D. Officers' files >> Officers' files | Elbrun Kimmelman
